directions:
Beat eggs in medium size mixing bowl.
Add cottage cheese, milk, chives, salt and pepper; beat until blended
Melt butter in skillet over low heat. Add egg mixture to butter; cook slowly, turning portions of cooked eggs with a spatula as they begin to thicken.
Do not stir; do not overcook. Remove from heat when done; serve immediately
title: Cottage Cheese Scrambled Eggs
